text: Basi jwaakusaka Allah kuti an'jongole, akasansapangulilaga chidali chakwe ku Usilamu, sano jwaakusaka kunnechelela kusokonechela, akasachitenda chidali chakwe kuŵa chakangani chaning'aning'a, gambakuŵa mpela akulikanganichisya kwela kwinani. Iyyoyopeyo ni yaakutiji Allah pakuŵika ilagasyo yakunyalaya kwa aŵala ŵangakukulupilila
